title: Slack 4.48.95
summary: February 19, 2026 We tidied the shelves, cleaned the windows and ran a white-gloved finger over every flat surface. Just a little routine maintenance to ensure that everything is shipshape. Full steam ahead!

title: Slack 4.48.94
summary: February 18, 2026 This release includes minor security improvements. Updating is beneficial.

title: Slack 4.48.92
summary: February 13, 2026 Hard work is happening this week, but nothing we can easily describe. It’s like a duck swimming on a pond. Under the water, the duck is paddling furiously, but on top all that can be seen is the gentle gliding of a bird on water. This week, Slack is the duck.

title: Slack 4.47.72
summary: December 12, 2025 This release includes minor security improvements. Updating is beneficial.

title: Slack 4.47.69
summary: December 8, 2025 Don’t mind us — just making a few small adjustments to keep the app in tip-top shape. More to come soon. Cheerio!

title: Slack 4.47.65
summary: November 24, 2025 This release includes security improvements. Updating is recommended.

title: Slack 4.47.59
summary: November 10, 2025 Bugs were squashed, performance was improved, work was done, and the result was good. Please enjoy Slack responsibly.

title: Slack 4.46.104
summary: October 21, 2025 All bugs that were fixed in this release were too small for the eye to see or too fiddly for human words to describe. Nevertheless, work was done, things tinkered with and the app became subtly better.

title: Slack 4.46.101
summary: October 6, 2025 A little reminder as you go about your day: The world is a more unique place simply because you’re a part of it, and you’ve affected others in ways you can’t imagine. Oh, and no big changes to the app this time. Happy messaging!

title: Slack 4.46.99
summary: September 22, 2025 This release includes security improvements. Updating is recommended.
